sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Grid, Paper, Chip, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow } from '@mui/material'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell, LineChart, Line } from 'recharts'; import { ArrowUpward, ArrowDownward } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { salesData, productData } from '../data/analyticsData'; const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042']; const Descriptive = () => { const totalSales = salesData.reduce((sum, d) => sum + d.sales, 0); const totalProfit = salesData.reduce((sum, d) => sum + d.profit, 0); const avgPrice = Math.round(salesData.reduce((sum, d) => sum + d.price, 0) / salesData.length); return ( {/* Header */} ðŸ“Š Descriptive Analytics "What happened?" â€” Understanding historical performance through data visualization {/* KPI Cards */} {[ { label: 'Total Sales (YTD)', value: `â‚¹${totalSales.toLocaleString()}`, change: '+12%', up: true, color: '#4caf50' }, { label: 'Total Profit', value: `â‚¹${totalProfit.toLocaleString()}`, change: '+8%', up: true, color: '#2196f3' }, { label: 'Avg Unit Price', value: `â‚¹${avgPrice}`, change: '-3%', up: false, color: '#ff9800' }, { label: 'Avg Complaints/Mo', value: '10.2', change: '+15%', up: true, color: '#f44336' }, ].map((kpi, i) => ( {kpi.label} {kpi.value} : } label={kpi.change} size="small" color={kpi.label.includes('Complaint') ? (kpi.up ? 'error' : 'success') : (kpi.up ? 'success' : 'warning')} /> ))} {/* Charts Row 1 */} Monthly Sales & Profit Trend Tracks revenue and profit across all 12 months to identify seasonal patterns. Product Profit Margins Breakdown of profit margin contribution by product category. `${name} ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%`}> {productData.map((entry, index) => ( ))} {productData.map((item, i) => ( {item.name} {item.profitMargin}% ))} {/* Charts Row 2 */} Price Trend Over Time Customer Complaints Trend {/* Data Table */} Raw Data Summary Month Sales (â‚¹) Profit (â‚¹) Price (â‚¹) Complaints Status {salesData.map((row) => ( {row.p} {row.sales.toLocaleString()} {row.profit.toLocaleString()} â‚¹{row.price} {row.complaints} = 3000 ? 'Good' : row.sales >= 2000 ? 'Average' : 'Low'} size="small" color={row.sales >= 3000 ? 'success' : row.sales >= 2000 ? 'warning' : 'error'} /> ))}
); }; export default Descriptive;
